from pct.functions import *
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def velocity_model(velocity,  force , mass):
    velocity = velocity + force / mass
    return velocity
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class PCTNodeData[source]

PCTNodeData(name='pctnodedata')

Data collected for a PCTNode

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class PCTNode[source]

PCTNode(perception=None, name='pctnode', history=False, **pargs)

A single PCT controller.

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
mass = 50
force = 0
vel = Variable(0, name="velocity")
node = PCTNode(vel, history=True)

another_node = PCTNode.from_config({ 'name': 'mypctnode', 
    'refcoll': {'0': {'type': 'Proportional', 'name': 'proportional', 'value': 0, 'links': {}, 'gain': 10}}, 
    'percoll': {'0': {'type': 'Variable', 'name': 'velocity', 'value': 0.2, 'links': {}}}, 
    'comcoll': {'0': {'type': 'Subtract', 'name': 'subtract', 'value': 1, 'links': {0: 'constant', 1: 'velocity'}}}, 
    'outcoll': {'0': {'type': 'Proportional', 'name': 'proportional', 'value': 10, 'links': {0: 'subtract'}, 'gain': 10}}})

mypctnode PCTNode
----------------------------
REF: proportional Proportional | gain 10 | 0 
PER: velocity Variable | 0.2 
COM: subtract Subtract | 1 | links  proportional velocity 
OUT: proportional Proportional | gain 10 | 10 | links  subtract 
----------------------------

----------------------------
REF: constant Constant | 1 
PER: velocity Variable | 0

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
output = node(verbose=False)
force = output
vel.set_value(velocity_model(vel.get_value(), force, mass))
print(force)
assert output == 10

10
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
velocity_input = Variable(0, name="velocity")
pctnode = PCTNode(velocity_input, history=True)
pctnode.set_function_name("refcoll", -1, "reference")

for i in range(40):
    force = pctnode(verbose=False)
    vel = velocity_model(velocity_input.get_value(), force, mass)
    velocity_input.set_value(vel)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
import plotly.graph_objects as go
fig = go.Figure(layout_title_text="Velocity Goal")
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(y=pctnode.history.data['refcoll']['reference'], name="ref"))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(y=pctnode.history.data['percoll']['velocity'], name="perc"))
